ranked_ideas.title: Salary Transparency Laws and New Hire Earnings (QWI Revision)
ranked_ideas.description: Major methodological upgrade: Replace CPS survey data with Census QWI administrative records that directly measure new hire earnings at county-quarter-sex level. Enables border discontinuity design following Dube, Lester & Reich (2010).
ranked_ideas.rationale: Addresses core reviewer concern about inability to separate new hires from incumbents. QWI EarnHirAS directly measures new hire earnings. Border design provides tighter identification.

selection_rationale: This is a revision of apep_0158. The single idea is the methodological upgrade requested by reviewers.
